text:
Defence Minister Manohar Parrikar on Saturday hoisted the largest tricolour in the country atop the tallest pole at Pahari Mandir in Ranchi.

The flag measures 66 feet in height and 99 feet in width. It was hoisted on a 293-foot-tall pole.

The flag, weighing 80 kg, will remain hoisted for 24 hours, as twenty sodium vapour lights illuminate it at night.

Until now, Faridabad had the tallest national flag raised at a height of 246 feet. — ANI
title: Largest and tallest tricolour hoisted at Ranchi
